mainHero.title: Trade With Confidence
mainHero.subtitle: AKNA Private Access
mainHero.description: The premier choice of serious traders for education, research and market monitoring. Stay informed of important stock market activity and dramatically improve your investment skills. Better trading is just a click away with the ultimate training platform trusted by stock traders worldwide.

items.title: A plug n play template
items.description: Just edit the config.json file with details about your company and voila your beautiful state of the art landing page is ready to go live! Remember to also update your assets, add any images you want to show to /assets/images and link them in the config.json

items.title: Make it your own!
items.description: Play around with the theme.ts file and configure the color palette to match the branding of your company! If you're feeling wild, maybe change some tailwind css as well!

features.title: LATEST & GREATEST
features.subtitle: REASONS TO SUBSCRIBE
features.description: Saves time, provides expert insights for diversification, capitalizes on market trends, and reduces the risk of uninformed decisions, aiding in long-term financial goals.

items.name: Idea Generation
items.description: Stay connected to Mark during the trading day via our WP community. Receive buy & sell alerts directly from Akshat the minute he pinpoints low risk - high reward opportunities.

items.name: Market Monitor
items.description: Keep abreast of important stock market activity, including breakouts, pullback buys and general market conditions with our real-time flash alerts. Stay Informed.

items.name: Logger
items.description: Track, analyze, optimize and perfect your trading.

items.name: Training
items.description: See live charts of top stocks picks, set-up criteria, specify entry & exit techniques, a review of general market analysis as well as questions answered LIVE.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
